MajorClaims.Text: I would prefer to live in an apartment in the community rather than in the university dormitories
the advantages of living in an apartment outshine those of living in a dormitory

Claims.Text: an apartment provides a lot more freedom than a dormitory
the studying conditions are better in an apartment

Premises.Text: While in a dormitory you have to obey preset rules, in the apartment you set your own rules
You are free to have visits at any time or to be left alone if you want
you can choose to have your own room instead of sharing with another student
you also get more space than you would in a dormitory
you could rent the extra rooms in the apartment to other people and rent would be a lot cheaper
Transportation is another issue, you have to go to and return from the university everyday
You could choose to use public transportation, a cheaper option, or to have a car
The car is an expensive option, but also offers freedom of schedule and destination
you don't have all the noise and distractions that you often have in dormitories
A lot of students often complain about their roommate playing music too loud or bringing friends over at inappropriate times
you would be able to concentrate better
in an apartment you don't have a roommate
you won't have a problem if you are the one who wants to play music, bring friends over, or study late at night
living in a dormitory, and being surrounded by students also has some advantages, like being able to get help with any academic issues from them
